speaker: Chorus
text_entry: SCENE I. London. A street.

speaker: Chorus
text_entry: Enter Corporal NYM and Lieutenant BARDOLPH

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Well met, Corporal Nym.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: Good morrow, Lieutenant Bardolph.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: What, are Ancient Pistol and you friends yet?

speaker: NYM
text_entry: For my part, I care not: I say little; but when

speaker: NYM
text_entry: time shall serve, there shall be smiles; but that

speaker: NYM
text_entry: shall be as it may. I dare not fight; but I will

speaker: NYM
text_entry: wink and hold out mine iron: it is a simple one; but

speaker: NYM
text_entry: what though? it will toast cheese, and it will

speaker: NYM
text_entry: endure cold as another man's sword will: and

speaker: NYM
text_entry: there's an end.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: I will bestow a breakfast to make you friends; and

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: we'll be all three sworn brothers to France: let it

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: be so, good Corporal Nym.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: Faith, I will live so long as I may, that's the

speaker: NYM
text_entry: certain of it; and when I cannot live any longer, I

speaker: NYM
text_entry: will do as I may: that is my rest, that is the

speaker: NYM
text_entry: rendezvous of it.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: It is certain, corporal, that he is married to Nell

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Quickly: and certainly she did you wrong; for you

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: were troth-plight to her.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: I cannot tell: things must be as they may: men may

speaker: NYM
text_entry: sleep, and they may have their throats about them at

speaker: NYM
text_entry: that time; and some say knives have edges. It must

speaker: NYM
text_entry: be as it may: though patience be a tired mare, yet

speaker: NYM
text_entry: she will plod. There must be conclusions. Well, I

speaker: NYM
text_entry: cannot tell.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: Enter PISTOL and Hostess

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Here comes Ancient Pistol and his wife: good

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: corporal, be patient here. How now, mine host Pistol!

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Base tike, call'st thou me host? Now, by this hand,

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: I swear, I scorn the term; Nor shall my Nell keep lodgers.

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: No, by my troth, not long; for we cannot lodge and

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: board a dozen or fourteen gentlewomen that live

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: honestly by the prick of their needles, but it will

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: be thought we keep a bawdy house straight.

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: NYM and PISTOL draw

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: O well a day, Lady, if he be not drawn now! we

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: shall see wilful adultery and murder committed.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Good lieutenant! good corporal! offer nothing here.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: Pish!

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Pish for thee, Iceland dog! thou prick-ear'd cur of Iceland!

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: Good Corporal Nym, show thy valour, and put up your sword.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: Will you shog off? I would have you solus.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: 'Solus,' egregious dog? O viper vile!

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: The 'solus' in thy most mervailous face;

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: The 'solus' in thy teeth, and in thy throat,

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: And in thy hateful lungs, yea, in thy maw, perdy,

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: And, which is worse, within thy nasty mouth!

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: I do retort the 'solus' in thy bowels;

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: For I can take, and Pistol's cock is up,

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: And flashing fire will follow.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: I am not Barbason; you cannot conjure me. I have an

speaker: NYM
text_entry: humour to knock you indifferently well. If you grow

speaker: NYM
text_entry: foul with me, Pistol, I will scour you with my

speaker: NYM
text_entry: rapier, as I may, in fair terms: if you would walk

speaker: NYM
text_entry: off, I would prick your guts a little, in good

speaker: NYM
text_entry: terms, as I may: and that's the humour of it.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: O braggart vile and damned furious wight!

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: The grave doth gape, and doting death is near;

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Therefore exhale.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Hear me, hear me what I say: he that strikes the

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: first stroke, I'll run him up to the hilts, as I am a soldier.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Draws

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: An oath of mickle might; and fury shall abate.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Give me thy fist, thy fore-foot to me give:

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Thy spirits are most tall.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: I will cut thy throat, one time or other, in fair

speaker: NYM
text_entry: terms: that is the humour of it.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: 'Couple a gorge!'

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: That is the word. I thee defy again.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: O hound of Crete, think'st thou my spouse to get?

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: No; to the spital go,

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: And from the powdering tub of infamy

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Fetch forth the lazar kite of Cressid's kind,

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Doll Tearsheet she by name, and her espouse:

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: I have, and I will hold, the quondam Quickly

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: For the only she; and--pauca, there's enough. Go to.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Enter the Boy

speaker: Boy
text_entry: Mine host Pistol, you must come to my master, and

speaker: Boy
text_entry: you, hostess: he is very sick, and would to bed.

speaker: Boy
text_entry: Good Bardolph, put thy face between his sheets, and

speaker: Boy
text_entry: do the office of a warming-pan. Faith, he's very ill.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Away, you rogue!

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: By my troth, he'll yield the crow a pudding one of

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: these days. The king has killed his heart. Good

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: husband, come home presently.

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: Exeunt Hostess and Boy

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Come, shall I make you two friends? We must to

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: France together: why the devil should we keep

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: knives to cut one another's throats?

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Let floods o'erswell, and fiends for food howl on!

speaker: NYM
text_entry: You'll pay me the eight shillings I won of you at betting?

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Base is the slave that pays.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: That now I will have: that's the humour of it.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: As manhood shall compound: push home.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: They draw

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: By this sword, he that makes the first thrust, I'll

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: kill him; by this sword, I will.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Sword is an oath, and oaths must have their course.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Corporal Nym, an thou wilt be friends, be friends:

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: an thou wilt not, why, then, be enemies with me too.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Prithee, put up.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: I shall have my eight shillings I won of you at betting?

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: A noble shalt thou have, and present pay;

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: And liquor likewise will I give to thee,

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: And friendship shall combine, and brotherhood:

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: I'll live by Nym, and Nym shall live by me;

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Is not this just? for I shall sutler be

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Unto the camp, and profits will accrue.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Give me thy hand.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: I shall have my noble?

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: In cash most justly paid.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: Well, then, that's the humour of't.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: Re-enter Hostess

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: As ever you came of women, come in quickly to Sir

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: John. Ah, poor heart! he is so shaked of a burning

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: quotidian tertian, that it is most lamentable to

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: behold. Sweet men, come to him.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: The king hath run bad humours on the knight; that's

speaker: NYM
text_entry: the even of it.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Nym, thou hast spoke the right;

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: His heart is fracted and corroborate.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: The king is a good king: but it must be as it may;

speaker: NYM
text_entry: he passes some humours and careers.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Let us condole the knight; for, lambkins we will live.
